name: Jumper (Mennalus)
description:
Test the PRE ALPHA game and let me know what you think!

Gamepad  to play

Gamepad Controls! 

D-Pad - left and right movement

Right thumbstick - aim with crosshair

'A' Button - Jump

Right lower shoulder trigger - Shoot!

Walljump is possible. Jump and be pushing left or right into a wall, then hit jump again and switch directions fast! Let me know if this is not intuitive ;)
